songs.title: Hey Good Lookin’
songs.album: A Why Don’t We Christmas - EP
songs.lyrics:
[Chorus: Daniel Seavey]
Hey, good lookin', how you doing?
Hey, good lookin', how you doing?
Hey, good lookin', what you doing
To me, to me, to me?
When I wake up, Christmas morning
Skip the presents and the stockings
Just to give up all your loving
To me, to me, to me

[Pre-Chorus: Jack Avery]
I'll spend up my whole life just staring at your eyes
And I'll lend my Christmas with you, if you really like

[Chorus: Jonah Marais & (All)]
Hey, good lookin', how you doing? (way up, way up)
Hey, good lookin', how you doing? (way up, way up)
Hey, good lookin', what you doing, (way up, way up)
To me, to me, to me? (way up, way up)
When I wake up, Christmas morning (way up, way up)
Skip the presents and the stockings (way up, way up)
Just to give up all your lovin', (way up, way up)
To me, to me, to me (way up, way up)

[Pre-Chorus: Zach Herron]
Oh, don't you go outside, it's way too cold tonight
Just stay at home with me, so I can hold you tight

[Chorus: Corbyn Besson & (All)]
Hey, good lookin', how you doing? (way up, way up)
Hey, good lookin', how you doing? (way up, way up)
Hey, good lookin', what you doing, (way up, way up)
To me, to me, to me? (way up, way up)
When I wake up, Christmas morning (way up, way up)
Skip the presents and the stockings (way up, way up)
Just to give up all your lovin', (way up, way up)
To me, to me, to me (way up, way up)

[Pre-Chorus: Daniel Seavey]
I'll take up my whole life just staring at your eyes
I'll lend my Christmas with you, if you really like

[Chorus: Daniel Seavey & Jack Avery & Jonah Marais & Zach Herron & (Corbyn Besson) & (All)]
Hey, good lookin', how you doing? (way up, way up)
Hey, good lookin', how you doing? (way up, way up)
Hey, good lookin', what you doing, (way up, way up)
To me, to me, to me? (way up, way up)
When I wake up, Christmas morning (way up, way up)
Skip the presents and the stockings (way up, way up)
(Just to give up all your loving,) (way up, way up)
(To me, to me, to me)
